name: Asumakina
description:
Asumakina Game Jam Brackeys 2020.2 Theme: <<Rewind <<A physics based arcade shooter pew pew...

The fire rate of your "X" depends on it's angular velocity, if your velocity is inreases so does your fire rate!

The theme "Rewind" was implemented in two ways:

  • You are able to rewind back where your trail started!
  • And when you drag and shoot you are rewinding your "X" to keep spinning!

Also there are cool power ups or "spiny bois" and paccs to give the game a better experience and loop. All the contents of this game are created by me (Lockhead) or are under the Creative Commons 0 License.

The game looks and runs better locally, look for the links down below to download it! (Windows) *coff coff * Follow me on my social media

click any icon

Made with Unity

P.s. Post-Processing is better than the Unity's Particle System
